description: This file defines React components for rendering and managing a list of Kanban cards, including drag-and-drop reordering and adding new cards within a Kanban board application.

methods.name: CardList
methods.description: Main React component for displaying a list of Kanban cards with drag-and-drop and add card functionality.

methods.name: handleAddCard
methods.description: Handles the submission of the form to add a new card to the column.

methods.name: DnDKanbanCard
methods.description: Component wrapping individual Kanban cards with drag-and-drop capabilities for reordering and moving between columns.
